name: Project Maze (itch) (mazeumich)
description:
Agents have been sent to uncover the mysteries of the maze, but none have made it back alive. You are our last hope to solve the mystery behind this maze.

Our intel has shown that the maze is a home to monsters that roam the halls. The monsters show hostility to foreigners of the maze. That's why we have equipped you with our latest weapons to protect yourself. You will also need to solve the mysteries behind the maze to reach the end. Adventure safely agent, we need you to put an end to this mysterious and deadly maze. 

Credits:

Hustin Cao, Jonathan Chen, Srimanisha Chilamkurthi, Alexander Czarnecki, Jackson Vails

Voice Actors:

Mileaka, Tom Gilvear
